initiate:
(:action initiate_new_member
    :parameters (?npc - person ?ss - society)
    :precondition (and
                    (member ?npc)
                    (not (initiated ?npc))
                    (not (full ?ss)))
    :effect (and
              (initiated ?npc)
              (increase (member_count ?ss) 1))
)

;; Action 2: Set meeting location
set:
(:action set_meeting_location
    :parameters (?npc - person ?ss - society ?l - location)
    :precondition (and
                    (initiated ?npc)
                    (member ?npc)
                    (not (location_set ?ss ?l)))
    :effect (location_set ?ss ?l)
)

;; Action 3: Set dress code
(:action set_dress_code
    :parameters (?npc - person ?ss - society ?d - dress_code)
    :precondition (and
                    (initiated ?npc)
                    (member ?npc)
                    (not (dress_code_set ?ss ?d)))
    :effect (dress_code_set ?ss ?d)
)

;; Action 4: Teach new member secret
create:
(:action create_new_member
    :parameters (?npc - person ?ss - secret_society)
    :precondition (and
                    (member ?npc ?ss)
                    (not (new_member_created ?npc ?ss)))
    :effect (new_member_created ?npc ?ss)
)
```

4. **Set Dress Code**

```pddl
(:action create_name
    :parameters (?npc - person ?ss - society ?n - name)
    :precondition (and
                    (initiated ?npc)
                    (member ?npc)
                    (not (name_set ?ss ?n)))
    :effect (name_set ?ss ?n)
)

;; Action 6: Create a secret or secret mission
(:action create_secret
    :parameters (?npc - person ?ss - society ?secret - secret)
    :precondition (and
                    (initiated ?npc)
                    (member ?npc)
                    (not (secret_set ?ss ?secret)))
    :effect (secret_set ?ss ?secret)
)

;; Action 7: Read cliques information
teach:
(:action teach_new_member_secret
    :parameters (?adrian - person ?ss - society)
    :precondition (and
                    (initiated ?adrian)
                    (member ?adrian)
                    (not (secret_known ?adrian ?ss)))
    :effect (secret_known ?adrian ?ss)
)

;; Action 5: Create name for society
read:
(:action read_cliques_info
    :parameters (?npc - person ?ss - society)
    :precondition (and
                    (initiated ?npc)
                    (member ?npc)
                    (not (cliques_info_read ?ss)))
    :effect (cliques_info_read ?ss)
)
```

These actions should help in defining the process of creating a cult as per the provided steps and descriptions.
